data_table.description: Participant ID, specimen ID, and sample use variable of participants with colon or ovarian tumors and involved in the "Clinical Proteomic Tumor Analysis Consortium (CPTAC) Proteogenomic Confirmatory Study of Breast, Colon, Lung, and Ovarian Tumors" project.

variable.name: Sample_Use
variable.description: Sample use. Array_SNP: SNP genotypes obtained using standard or custom microarrays; Seq_DNA_WholeExome: Whole exome sequencing; Seq_RNA: Whole transcriptome sequencing; Seq_miRNA: Sequencing of microRNA
